SEARCH

Class Building

java.lang.Object
Building
public class Building extends Object
Building object for each building in the map system Buildings contain: A floor list which contains all the floor objects within the building A building name Total number of floors A building image, with x, y, width, and height A hitbox object for the main screen interactions
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mustafa Atoof

    Building constructor.

  • Constructor Details

    • Building

      public Building(ArrayList<Floor> floorList, String buildingName, BufferedImage buildingImg, int x, int y, int width, int height, int screen)
      Building constructor. Creates a new building.
      Parameters:
      floorList - the list of floors in this building
      buildingName - the name of the building
      buildingImg - image object of building
      x - the x coordinate of the building image
      y - the y coordinate of the building image
      width - the width of the building image
      height - the height of the building image
      screen - screen for creating the hitbox

    • recalculateX

      public void recalculateX(int index)
      This method recalculates the x position of the buildings so that the buildings are always centered on the screen, also updates the hitbox
      Parameters:
      index - int index of where the building is in the buildings arraylist in main
